title: which block do we have to go to submit the original documents in rr campus?

comments.body: mrd block. it's the first block on your right hand side when you enter the campus.
it is also called the silver jubilee block right?
okay i assume there's an office their?
yep, you'll have to submit it in the admissions office.
When is the last date to submit the original documents?
in the website its given 15 july but i heard from seniors you can submit it even after joining college
